Staff, very rare (requires attunement by a wizard)
This iron-shod wooden staff is heavily worn, and it can be wielded as a quarterstaff that grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. The staff has 10 charges and regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff loses all of its magic and becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.
While holding the staff, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.JVimVp4IvmQTO52h]{arcane lock} (2 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.a79cPbF5G33jiDBa]{dimension door} (4 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.KW9pI3ghpmz6J5T1]{knock} (2 charges), or @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.IWRO3njx4Jym0qZc]{passwall} (5 charges).
